meanings.sent1: She admired the hipped dress that accentuated her curves.
meanings.sent2: The hipped woman gracefully walked down the street.
meanings.sent3: The hipped man struggled to find pants that fit his wide hips.
meanings.sent4: Her hipped figure made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The hipped silhouette of the statue was striking against the skyline.

meanings.sent1: The cozy cottage had a hipped roof that added charm to its appearance.
meanings.sent2: The hipped house withstood the storm without any damage.
meanings.sent3: The hipped roof provided shade for the porch on sunny days.
meanings.sent4: The hipped structure of the barn was a unique feature in the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The hipped roof of the building sloped elegantly towards the garden.

meanings.definition: To have a hip or hips.
meanings.sent1: She hipped her way through the dance floor with confidence.
meanings.sent2: The toddler hipped around the room, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent3: He hipped towards the buffet, eager to try the delicious food.
meanings.sent4: The cat hipped over the fence effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The athlete hipped over the hurdle with agility and speed.
